Mail.Subject: Log - IBM Brassring Integration
Mail.Body:
Hi,
        
      SuperVision MVR reports are processed successfully. Please review the attached log file for more details.
    
      Thank you,
      Velocity HCM.

RequestData.Envelope: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <Envelope version="01.00"> <Sender> <Id>HRXMLEMPLID</Id> <Credential>26183</Credential> </Sender> <Recipient> <Id /> </Recipient> <TransactInfo transactType="data"> <TransactId>15747</TransactId> <TimeStamp>2020-05-08 08:14 AM</TimeStamp> </TransactInfo> <Packet> <PacketInfo packetType="data"> <PacketId>1</PacketId> <Action>SET</Action> <Manifest>SUPERVISION_FORM</Manifest> </PacketInfo> <Payload></Payload> </Packet> </Envelope>
